review: It does exactly what it says it will do. A great source of entertainment.
author: Michael W.

review: The Fire Stick has provided me with everything I wanted, but now I have to consider signing up with Amazon Prime even though I currently use Netflix. Hmmm...
author: tonyp

review: VERY easy to use.  Made my 'dumb' TV very smart, very quickly.
author: RedW9

review: Generally quite good. Easy set up. Need shows from OWN and BET. Takes too long to boot up, but I still like it. No cable bill is great.
author: Elaine Mitchell "Lainie"

review: What an awesome gadget to have and and being a Prime member so many shows and movies free!
author: Elaine Hofslien

review: so far this has been a great addition, I purchased this to free up my laptop when someone missed a TV show or rented a movie. and the fact that Longmire is going to be on Netflix's this season.
author: Mike

review: It works perfectly, but I wanted to send from my tablet to the tv.  It will only do that with the kindal tabs.
author: Charles E Howard

review: great value for money. Easy to setup and use too. Kinda like it more than my apple tv now.
author: Dennis Dumdumaya

review: I have a chromecast but got this for prime instant video. It  turned out to be better than the chromecast.
author: mitch053
